reviews.review: Игра морально выжигает. Игры так делать не должны. Часов 20 нормально поиграть можно, но дальше у вас 2 пути: деградировать в выжившего со своей тимой и портить жизнь убийцам или удалить игру. Выбор за каждым. После 20 часов не надейтесь на хороший геймплей

Muito divertido. Se tiver amigos para jogar junto fica melhor ainda! De início, quando não se está acostumado com o jogo, pode ficar tenso, levar susto, e dependendo da pessoa que estiver jogando e da criatura que estiver te caçando você pode até sentir um pouco de medo em alguns momentos, principalmente quando não se conhece o tal caçador da vez. Jogo constantemente atualizado com vilões clássicos dos filmes de terror. E mesmo com o caçador mais amador do mundo, não tem como não ficar tenso ao reparar um gerador, ou ao iniciar a abertura das portas, e se ficar sozinho, torça pra achar a escotilha por que senão, você já era!

This sh!tty game's devs haven't been solved a single problem since 4 years. Camping, tunneling and gerushing are still a huge problem in the gameplay since 2016. I bet they are new at the gaming industries and that's why  it's so hard to them to test their own game. Both killer and survival can play like a real a$$hole, sabotaging other's gameplay with it. For killers it's camping, and tunneling. Imagine that, you were caught in the first minute of the game and got hooked. If the killer camps, others don't really have a chance to unhook you (only if they do use borrowed time). Even if they got you unhooked and maybe healed up, if the killer tunnels, then he will not gonna chase anyone else other than you. Which means you literally can't do any actions so you don't get bloodpoints and points to medals and you die in 5 minutes even if there's a lot of loops near by. And to be honest there are a lot of unbalanced, even empty maps like the game, lery's, haddonfield,  or midwich. On the other side, there's genrushing. Which has been nerfed many times, but it's still too fast (even without prove thyself). This way of playing the game can easily counter any killer, on any map, with any addons. But if you don't use this technique In cases like infinity tier 3 mori myers, you have no chance to win. There are plenty of killer addons which are a way too strong. Survivors doesn't even have the instant heal at least. The gameplay is not played properly and the dev's supposed to force the players to play more fairly. Like 1 out of 5 matches are enjoyable for me cause of a bad designed map, an overpowered killer or an unfair playstyle. Death Garden: Blood harvest was even more playable ...

くりかえしプレイし続ければ大抵のことには慣れてきます。
そこそこ上手くなれば、非対称型の対戦ゲームながら、熱い駆け引きが楽しめます。
運営は上級者向けと言っていますが「キラー」はBP効率が良くオススメです。
営々とキラーにいそしみBPを稼ぐのです。
死んでしまっても「サバイバー」のほうが疲労感は少なかったりするのですが。

Dead by Daylight is basically the Smash Bros. of horror with how many collaborations they have with different franchises, as a huge horror fan I love this so much and DbD has become one of my favorite games of all time after playing it since it came out in 2016! Behaviour is a bit questionable sometimes in their design/balance decisions but the game is still so fun nonetheless

Super fun game to play with friends.

I've not tried being a killer yet, but being a survivor is awesome. I'd recommend it to anyone who has friends to play with. It's also pretty cool that it's cross platform since I have friends on PS4 too and we can play together.
Devs havent fixed simple hit boxes for years. Dont buy it unless you want your day ruined. Anyways, time to play some more (im addicted and its bad for my health).
It's a great game, I personally like the killer part, but I despise the survivor part but all the same its good.

Fun with to play with friends and alone but the matchmaking is horribly unbalanced to where you can end up playing against people who are 10 to 15 ranks higher than you making the game a miserable experience.

I am new to this game. Rank 19ish. GOING AGAINST RANK 10 KILLERS? okay. On top of that the game says I have some kinda VAC or something each time I start the game so I am forced to manage properties on steam and have the file's integrety searched or whatever. Kinda not worth getting shit on by better players. Im fine with losing, but im rank 19 bro. Dont be putting me against rank 10s. Thats not fun.

To start off the game is crap. The hit boxes are horrible, there are many fps drops, and there are many different in game mechanics that just don't work. For example if i jumped through a window and i was safe, somehow the killer is able to hit me. I do know you can be hit through windows but you can literally be so far away and somehow it still counts as a hit. Overall the game is crap but it has potential, maybe if their team worked harder they can fix these issues. All in all this game has potential but not quite there yet. Thanks for reading!

I have waited a very long time to do this review for dead by daylight.  I have played it for a long while but maybe not as much as others.  All the pros, cons, and in-betweens of this game can be summed up in one word:












Gamer.

competitively fast pace or slow pace (varies on player experience or killer speed if you decide to play as killer), immense heart pounding fun to be had here, only thing is they need more optimization on textures/ performance, sometimes even on a samsung 860 evo  & 4k monitor with hdr 10 still looks mush at times, but over all solid fun.
amazing game one of my favorites
